column15: Cello Polypropylene - Containers  Best Price Rs 306.00  EMI Rs 51 for 6 months
column17:
This airtight liquid tight and stackable container is a must have in your kitchen. It is crafted out of polypropane and has a capacity of 2500ml. This container from the house of Cello is sure to keep your food fresh.

Features
  • Brand: Cello
  • Category: Homeware
  • Type: Container
  • Colour: Blue
  • Shape: Rectangular
  • Material: Polypropane
  • Pattern: Solid
  • Capacity (in ml): 2500
  • Contents: 1 container
  • Other Feature: Dishwasher safe very handy easy to use

Care Tips
Clean with a soft sponge and normal detergent
Do not use harsh chemicals or products to avoid scratches
Remove unwanted marks by rubbing the utensils with lemon
